input.sentences: a couple poses behind a board sticking their face through it .
there is a small fair going on while they are there .
they come across a candy shop .
they had to buy some cotton candy .
output.sentences: Today at Brighton Pier, we were photographed sticking out heads through holes and making poses as an animated couple.
The town is beautiful, so we took a tour of the beach.
Then we went to the fair.
At the fair, we went to a little shop and got some candy floss.
It was the best cotton candy you can buy!
